name: Altarac Goes To The Fridge To Get A Glass of Milk
name_original: Altarac Goes To The Fridge To Get A Glass of Milk
description:
Altarac Goes To The Fridge To Get A Glass Of Milk

Includes Chapters 1-3 PLUS 2 ADDITIONAL DLC Adventures! 

It's finally here! Play the ending to Altarac's thrilling, three-part story! 

You begin as a science teacher who wakes up from a nightmare. Parched, you decide a glass of milk will quench your thirst. Upon arriving at the fridge, you find an unexpected surprise... What you initially thought to be a normal day, ends up being a wacky adventure! Indulge yourself in a rich world of fun characters, mini games, and a fantastic story. 

Altarac Goes To The Fridge To Get A Glass Of Milk is available here on itch.io as well as Game Jolt!
